attributes.comment:
I am a prospective Adoptive parent, just at the beginning of our long wait for
our child from China, we were already upset that we would have to renew our I
600 A and fingerprints, which expire after 18 months, but to raise the fees over
140% is absurd, all we want to do is become a parent, and to have a family, why
is our Govenment so unwilling to help us make that happen. To help us you need
to make the I 600 A and fingerprints valid for at least 24 months, and to keep
fees at a minimum, I understand the increase but not a 140% increase.
Sincerely, Christine Birchfield
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Christine Birchfield
